title: Tearjerker
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>This musical was quite interesting. I’ve never seen it before, but it really gets you invested. What do you think, Shizuku?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Shizuku?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>....*sniff*<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh, huh!? Are you crying? W-, what happened!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Uuu, *sniff*.... It was so good.... When I try thinking about it, the feelings just overwhelm me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>The actress for the main girl was amazing....! The monologue at the climax truly moved me.... *sniff*, Uuu~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Geez, please don’t cry. I really liked that part too. That scene screamed of her determination and mental anguish.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yes, that’s right! Uwaaah, I’m glad you understand, Maki-san~. Thank you for coming to see this with me today~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Thank you also for inviting me. Come on, please stop crying, and let’s leave the venue. Let’s continue talking about our thoughts outside.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
